name: TheBoringFactSkill
0:
”Alexa, open mister boring”
”Alexa, ask mister boring for a fact”
”Alexa, tell mister boring i am too excited”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mister boring
des: Hear well-known boring facts in order to bore you when you have too much energy or when you're bored already.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
